titles.title: National Election Fairness Act
To prohibit a State official from releasing the results of a Presidential election in the State prior to the closing of the polls for such election in all States within the continental United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 11/04/1997--Introduced. National Election Fairness Act - Prohibits the release of presidential election results prior to the closing of the polls for such election in all States within the continental United States.
